details.description: The search functionality on the /search page is vulnerable to SQL injection. Submitting a single quote (') as the search query caused the application to return a detailed database error page, confirming the vulnerability.
details.impact: An attacker can execute arbitrary SQL queries to read, modify, or delete data from the database, potentially leading to a full compromise of the application and its data.
details.recommendation: Implement parameterized queries (prepared statements) for all database interactions involving user-supplied input. This will ensure that user input is treated as data and not as executable SQL code.
